keywords: convenience@add rice for a complete meal
subtitle:
This healthy recipe has a delicate Oriental flavour.
You can vary the vegetables depending on what's available.

method.text: With a sharp knife, make a slit through one side of each chicken breast, to open out a large pocket. Season the inside of the pocket with salt, pepper and lemongrass. Tuck the chopped salad onions into the chicken.
Trim the carrots, courgettes and celery. Cut into even matchstick pieces. Plunge them into a pan of boiling water for 1 min. Drain and toss in the soy sauce.
Pack the pockets in each chicken breast with the vegetables and fold over firmly to enclose. Reserve any vegetables that are left over.

Wash and dry the spinach leaves. Wrap the chicken breasts firmly in the leaves to enclose completely. If the leaves are too firm to wrap the chicken easily, steam them for a few seconds until they soften.
Half-fill steamer with boiling water. Place the wrapped chicken in the steamer and steam over rapidly boiling water for 20-25 min, depending on size.

title: Steamed chicken and spring vegetable parcels
